Articles.Content:
Typical mission to the Mun, Minmus or whatever. Right click to focus on any of those, Works as usual. Hit Backspace to return focus on your vessel, (in space map) and nothing happens. Has something changed and I've missed it?

 

Any help greatly appreciated. Sorry forgot to say no mods.                

Edited November 13, 2016 by SpacedCowboy

Backspace for resetting focus was changed to backquote to avoid conflict with the default keybinding for the 'Abort' action group.


Happy landings
Wait, wait, I'm dumb this way. What is the "backquote"  button?

It's the tilde ` & ~ key.

Right above the Tab key.

Near the top left on most US type keyboards.  Same key as the tilde.

I can't type these because I have that key assigned to a different function.

Happy landings!

Yes, got it now. Thanks so much for your input!

This is a game changer.
